import React from "react"; export default function Testimonials() { const makeAvatar = (label) => `data:image/svg+xml;utf8,${encodeURIComponent( `` )}`; const people = [ { id: 1, img: makeAvatar("U1"), pos: "left-[1%] top-[20px] md:left-[6%] md:top-[40px]" }, { id: 2, img: makeAvatar("U2"), pos: "left-[20%] top-[30px] md:left-[18%] md:top-[80px]" }, { id: 3, img: makeAvatar("U3"), pos: "left-[0.1%] top-[80px] md:left-[10%] md:top-[200px]" }, { id: 4, img: makeAvatar("U4"), pos: "left-[22%] top-[90px] md:left-[35%] md:top-[70px]" }, { id: 5, img: makeAvatar("U5"), pos: "left-[65%] top-[20px] md:left-[52%] md:top-[70px]" }, { id: 6, img: makeAvatar("U6"), pos: "left-[40%] top-[10px] md:left-[25%] md:top-[230px]" }, { id: 7, img: makeAvatar("U7"), pos: "right-[14%] top-[70px] md:right-[20%] md:top-[100px]" }, ]; return (
{people.map((p) => ( ))}

Testimonials

Our customers share amazing experiences with our cleaning services.

{/* ⭐ Smaller Card + Fixed Content */}

"The team was professional, thorough and respectful of my home."

Carol Smith
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 5.0
); }
